response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item offers unparalleled performance, efficiency, and innovation, making it an invaluable asset for any professional or enthusiast. Considering its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than its face value, but we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-value item at a competitive rate. We look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 750000}
